Articles.Content:
THAT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE A SECRET!

The person below yours truly actually has some comedic value to the jokes he/she makes.

IMO, yes.

The user below me has a disturbing avatar.

not at all, it's yours not mine i m just a selfhy without real existence at all but the annoying and crappy flesh part reminder. (yo do must breath and eat you silly mind that want to leave this realm)

the user below me is

Yes, I exist.

Unlike the one below me.

I do not exist, I am just a figment of your imagination! AND I AM THE OVERLORD. jk im real, unlike the number i

The user below me does not like doughnuts.

Aw hell naw! Donuts aremlove, donuts are life.

The user below me has listened to Beethoven at least once.

who hasnt?

the user below me is french

lol no

The User Below Me has an opinion about the periapsis of the ISS's orbit.

No.

The user below me has been on a train at least once.

True - it's a bit too high for me to reach out & touch the ISS with my hand when it passes there. Why u sneaky ninja...

Still true.

The user below me will not entertain us with a funny joke.

Sadly yes.

Though that will change.

False???

The user below me will answer false or with another negative word such as no or not.

Yes!

The user below me has recently tripped over.

No.

The user below me has played more than 50 different games.

True. I've played thousands of games.

Unlike this guy...

Very false.

TUBM will answer false to this.

windows_x_seven.exe has crashed

The user below me worships me before going to sleep

False, I only use windows 8.1 with a windows 7 virtural machine installed; and I do not worship it.

TUBM will use windows 10 when possible.

lol no

The user below me knows the first 3 billion numbers of pi.

No, but I know the first: 0 (rounded to the nearest 10). Good enough for most aerospace applications.

The user below me likes strawberry ice cream more that carmel.

I hate both, to be honest. My palette isn't as expansive as it could be, but I still like to cook.

EDIT: Well now that I thought about it, I should specify that I'm more of a custard fan, as weird as that may be.

I bet you that [insert name here]'s palette is wider than mine.

Edited July 4, 2015 by Xannari Ferrows

I don't even paint LOL, and I've always wondered what a Palette was before now.

I bet the person below me doesn't live in the Western Hemisphere.

I do live in the western hemisphere, so false.

The user below me is on a plane.

nah

the user below me is on a boat

Untrue. I AM the boat.

But the user below me is a cruise liner...
